mapper.select: SELECT trade_id , title , fn_get_code_name(trade_category) as trade_category , price , trade_place , fn_get_code_name(trade_type) as trade_type , fn_get_code_name(promise_status) as promise_status , write_date FROM trade ORDER BY write_date desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT t.trade_id , t.title , t.description , fn_get_code_name(trade_category) as trade_category , t.price , t.trade_place , fn_get_code_name(trade_type) as trade_type , fn_get_code_name(promise_status) as promise_status , t.write_date , t.seller_id , a.save_file FROM trade t JOIN attachment a ON(t.trade_id = a.post_id) WHERE a.menu_type = 'AA1' AND a.attachment_seq = (select min(attachment_seq) from attachment where post_id = t.trade_id)
ORDER BY write_date desc ) A WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 6 ) B WHERE B.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 6
